name: Verify PostgreSQL client installation in Shell app via UI
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- PostgreSQL app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Install Shell app.
- Open Shell app.
- Install `postgresql-client` in Shell app.

### Verify that:

- `postgresql-client` packet is installed successfully.
descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • PostgreSQL app installed.

Steps:

  • Login with valid credentials.
  • Install Shell app.
  • Open Shell app.
  • Install postgresql-client in Shell app.

Verify that:

  • postgresql-client packet is installed successfully.
